data.title: Polymakr: Entirely New Materials for Desktop 3D Printing by Polymakr — Kickstarter
data.name: Polymakr
data.description: Polymakr brings to you 3 entirely new printing materials that greatly extend what you can do with your desktop 3D printer.

data.title: NEXT GENERATION 3D PRINTER EXTRUDERS: THE RUGGED-HPX LINE by Dglass 3D — Kickstarter
data.name: Dglass 3D
data.description: Add color & material capacity and reliability to your 3D Printer with our slimmer dual extruder that installs in the space of a single!

data.title: 3D-printed aerospike rocket engine by Nadir Bagaveyev — Kickstarter
data.name: Nadir Bagaveyev
data.description: Help us develop and launch first rocket with 3D-printed rocket engine

data.title: Maker Kase - Universal 3D Printer Cabinet by People Wear Inc — Kickstarter
data.name: People Wear Inc
data.description: Universal Maker cabinet. Perfect for 3D printers, model makers, small CNC machines and open frame Bitcoin Miners.

data.title: Makeraser + Makelastic - Accessories for 3D Printers by Christopher LoBello — Kickstarter
data.name: Christopher LoBello
data.description: The Makeraser is a multitool to smooth, remove or improve 3D prints, and Makelastic can rubberize them too!

data.title: 3DMonstr: Large, industrial-grade, quad-extruder 3D printer by Ben Reytblat — Kickstarter
data.name: Ben Reytblat
data.description: The next generation industrial-grade, quad-extruder 3D printer: upgradeable, foldable, and prints fine detail and large volumes.

data.title: Vectr - Open Source 3D Sensing Gesture Controller by Matt Heins — Kickstarter
data.name: Matt Heins
data.description: Control audio with movements and gestures in free space

data.title: Pico: All-Metal Hotend for RepRap 3D Printers by B3 Innovations, LLC — Kickstarter
data.name: B3 Innovations, LLC
data.description: A premium, fully assembled all-metal hot-end capable of 300°C printing. Available in 3mm & 1.75mm. Machined and Assembled in the USA.

data.title: Deltaprintr - A simple, affordable 3D Printer! by Deltaprintr — Kickstarter
data.name: Deltaprintr
data.description: The Deltaprintr is a new take on efficient, high-resolution 3D printing. Take your designs to new heights!

data.title: Solidator DLP Desktop 3D Printer by tangible engineering USA Corporation — Kickstarter
data.name: tangible engineering USA Corporation
data.description: The fastest Desktop 3D Printer on the planet prints 1.5 Billion Voxels in 5.5 hours on a massive 11.8 liter build volume (280x210x200)
